questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: How I imagine my life in 2026? In fact, I did not think about the future be cause I think that life is a mysterious path. The best way to be happy is to enjoy the present moment. Past is just nostalgia, future is just mysterious but present is a gift. So I have no idea of what I will look like in 2026, happy or not, alone or married, it does not matter...
